ActSafe Food for Canadians Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Safe Food for Canadians Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SAFE FOOD FOR CANADIANS REGULATIONS in order to (1) simplify and reduce duplication of labelling requirements by harmonizing certain food commodity-specific requirements and by repealing others; and (2) clarify to stakeholders that the licensing and related provisions do not apply to the preparation of food by restaurants and similar enterprises, maintaining the status quo.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0144 Publication Date: 2022-07-06
AttachmentsAttachment
